column1: #text=For a long time , I was planning to read a book about stock trading .
#text=When I went online most of the books were quite expensive .
#text=But there was a library very close to my house .
#text=That lead me to think about borrowing one book from the library .
#text=One Saturday morning I went there and browsed several books .
#text=I spent almost 2 hours to finalize a book .
#text=Finally I stood in the line for the check out counter .
#text=When it was my turn , I gave the person at the counter the book that I chose .
#text=They asked me for the membership card but that is when I realized that I did n't have one .
#text=I decided to apply for a new membership card .
#text=All that was needed for the membership application was my ID card .
#text=I was given a new membership card within 5 minutes .
#text=I used it to borrow the book that I selected .
#text=I was told that the book needs to be returned within 7 days .
#text=Overall the experience was a nice one and I would keep going there .
